name: Little Rescue
description:
(SPANISH Language) Synopsis

Play the role of the protagonist and help him to save all the children who are locked in the forest

Objetive

Bring all children back to their parents

Controls

To move, use the joystick on the screen, and to shoot, use the trigger button

Save us!

Music Credits

  • UI SFX
  • Shot SFX
  • Jump SFX
  • Score Music
  • Gameplay Music
  • Menu Song
